paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Among mutation carriers, there were eight patients carrying exonic deletions, including: BRCA1 (2), MUTYH (2), ATM (1), BRCA (1), MLH1 (1), RAD51C (1); and five presenting Alu insertions in BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: Functional impact not detailed in the paper.

variants.additional_notes: Only one specific variant was detailed.
